attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many companies are using equipment to automatically dial telephone numbers, possibly at random, and on answer switch the call to an operator for telemarketing. If they do not have enough operators, the call is silent and hung up causing distress and anxiety to vulnerable members of the community. I assert that such calls, once considered as malicious but now normal commercial practice, should be banned by law. 
The Telephone Preference Service has not been given any powers to deal with these call with Ofcom oddly
